name: Third Person Fighting Game
description:
VIDEO PLAYTHROUGH

This is a project created in Unreal Engine that is suppose to be a placeholder for a RPG fighting game resembling the Dark Souls franchise. I have implemented many features into this sandbox level that does not include any level design. 

Feel free to jump in and mess around with all of the features, even the AI interaction. Everything is clearly labeled in the sandbox level. Please note there are some bugs still present, but this is still in a prototype stage and nothing is final. 

The controls can be found in the main menu of the executable.
